title: Restructure Role YAML config with nested agent_harness section
description: Add AgentHarnessConfig struct to config/role.go with nested agent_harness YAML section (harness_type, model, claude_config_dir, codex_config_dir, command). Add accessor methods (GetHarnessType, GetModel, GetClaudeConfigDir, GetCodexConfigDir, GetHarnessConfig) with backward compat fallback from deprecated top-level fields (agent_type, model, claude_config_dir). Update role template in cmd/role.go to use new nested format. Update all callers of role.Model, role.GetAgentType(), role.GetClaudeConfigDir().
